title: Performance-Based Health Sciences Education Improvement Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Health Science Concepts and Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Modern health science education environments focusing on integrated curricula and educational technology utilization

learning_goals: Learners can design health science education modules by applying performance-based instructional methods.
Learners can utilize at least three student engagement strategies using digital tools.
Learners can improve their presentation/facilitation skills by 20% through instructional techniques (self-assessment and peer assessment).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
